h#summary List of wikifarms and their statuses
#sidebar Sidebar
== List of wikifarms ==

We collect [http://code.google.com/p/wikiteam/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Flistsofwikis lists of wikifarms wikis]. If you know about a wiki which is missing in the lists, please, leave a comment. See also the [https://wikiapiary.com/wiki/Farm:Main_Page Wikiapiary wikifarms list].

=== MediaWiki ===
  * [http://editthis.info EditThis.info] (online but flaky, pending archive)
  * elwiki.com (offline and lost)
  * [https://meta.orain.org Orain] (online, [https://archive.org/details/wikifarm-orain.org-20130824 archived], [https://meta.orain.org/wiki/Database_list domain list])
  * [http://www.referata.com Referata] (Semantic MediaWiki) (online, [http://archive.org/details/referata.com-20111204 archive #1], [http://archive.org/details/wikifarm-referata.com-20130824 archive #2])
  * ScribbleWiki (offline and lost)
  * Sourceforge: subdomains and sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/`*` (online, [https://archive.org/search.php?query=sourceforge%20wiki mostly archived])
  * [http://www.shoutwiki.com ShoutWiki] 700+ wikis (online, [http://www.archive.org/details/shoutwiki.com archived])
  * [http://tropicalwikis.com TropicalWikis] [http://www.tropicalwikis.com/wiki/Special:Farmer/list 100+ wikis] (offline, allegedly pending move to Orain)
  * [http://www.wikia.com Wikia] 340,000+ wikis (online, [https://archive.org/details/wikia_dump_20121109 partial archive 1], [http://archive.org/details/wikia_dump_20121204 2]) (see the [https://community.wikia.com/wiki/Help:Database_download database download help page] and the [https://github.com/Wikia/app/tree/dev/extensions/wikia/WikiFactory/Dumps dumping code they use])
  * [http://wiki-site.com Wiki-site.com] by [http://www.active.co.il/english.html ActiveTech] (online but flaky, pending archive)
  * [http://wikihub.ssu.lt WikiHub] (online, [https://archive.org/details/wikifarm-wikihub.ssu.lt-20131110 archived])
  * [http://wikkii.com Wikkii] 3,000+ wikis (online but flaky, [https://archive.org/search.php?query=wikkii 1300+ wikis saved])

=== Not MediaWiki ===
  * Wik.is (offline)
